languages.text: "Если ты так уверен в своей праведности, то почему же ты до сих пор сам не предстал перед судом Чорда?"
"If you are so sure of your own righteousness, why have you not faced Chorda's justice yet?"
languages.original_text: "Если ты так уверен в своей праведности, то почему же ты до сих пор сам не предстал перед судом Чорда?"

traits.locale_text: "If you are so sure of your own righteousness, why have you not faced Chorda's justice yet?"
"If you are so sure of your own righteousness, why have you not faced Chorda's justice yet?"
"If you are so sure of your own righteousness, why have you not faced Chorda's justice yet?"
"If you are so sure of your own righteousness, why have you not faced Chorda's justice yet?"
"If you are so sure of your own righteousness, why have you not faced Chorda's justice yet?"
"If you are so sure of your own righteousness, why have you not faced Chorda's justice yet?"

languages.text: “既然你对你的正义这么确信，那你为什么还没有面对库尔达的审判？”
languages.original_text: "If you are so sure of your own righteousness, why have you not faced Chorda's justice yet?"

traits.locale_text: “既然你对你的正义这么确信，那你为什么还没有面对库尔达的审判？”

languages.text: 「己の正義にそこまで自信があるのなら、なぜまだチョーダの裁きを受けていない？」
languages.original_text: "If you are so sure of your own righteousness, why have you not faced Chorda's justice yet?"

traits.locale_text: 「己の正義にそこまで自信があるのなら、なぜまだチョーダの裁きを受けていない？」

languages.text: «Si está tan seguro de su rectitud, ¿por qué no se ha enfrentado aún a la justicia de Chorda?».
languages.original_text: "If you are so sure of your own righteousness, why have you not faced Chorda's justice yet?"

traits.locale_text: «Si está tan seguro de su rectitud, ¿por qué no se ha enfrentado aún a la justicia de Chorda?».

languages.text: "Wenn Ihr Euch Eurer eigenen Rechtschaffenheit so sicher seid, warum habt Ihr Euch noch nicht Chordas Gerechtigkeit gestellt?"
languages.original_text: "If you are so sure of your own righteousness, why have you not faced Chorda's justice yet?"

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Ihr Euch Eurer eigenen Rechtschaffenheit so sicher seid, warum habt Ihr Euch noch nicht Chordas Gerechtigkeit gestellt?"

languages.text: « Puisque vous semblez convaincu de votre propre droiture, pourquoi n'avez-vous pas encore fait face à la justice de Chorda ? »
languages.original_text: "If you are so sure of your own righteousness, why have you not faced Chorda's justice yet?"

traits.locale_text: « Puisque vous semblez convaincu de votre propre droiture, pourquoi n'avez-vous pas encore fait face à la justice de Chorda ? »

languages.text: "Kendi doğruluğundan bu derece eminsen neden Chorda'nın adaletiyle henüz yüzleşmedin?"
languages.original_text: "If you are so sure of your own righteousness, why have you not faced Chorda's justice yet?"

traits.locale_text: "Kendi doğruluğundan bu derece eminsen, neden Chorda'nın adaletiyle henüz yüzleşmedin?"
